ygData.subject: Iron Raptor/ IRIS

* Iron Raptor glanced towards Iris for a moment before looking back towards 
Prowl.*

< Well, I was never a fast learner anyway.>

* A last glance was exchanged between Iris mand Iron Raptor before Prowl 
responded and slid his arm around her and took a strong hold.
She didn't really like flying, but she guessed that since she had been given 
wings she might as well get use to it.*

< Remember, Iris, right to the meeting.>

* Iris simply nodded and stood back a bit.*

IRIS: < Yeah, yeah, I know. But YOU remember, don't let the featherhead get 
all the glory from now on. And if you aren't back by morning I'm coming to 
look for you.>

* Iron Raptor was just about to begin arguing once again when she heard 
Prowls' bosters power up, sliding her arms around his neck.*

< Fine.>

* Was all she was able to get out before Prowl took off, closing her eyes 
tightly, the air feeling as if she was constantly being hit by a wall. Her 
sensors detecting their speed, 100 mph!
Iron Raptor was almost basically plastered to Prowl, and it wasn't just the 
pressure of the air either. They were high and going very fast, which was 
sending her speak thumping in her chest at nearly the same speed as they 
were flying.*

< Prowl! Slow down!>

* There was no use in speaking because, with their speed, her voice would 
have been lost.
Iron Raptor tightens her hold on Prowl a bit, opening her eyes slightly to 
look into his face.
But then she heard his thought, and tightened her hold on him just as he had 
instructed. But why?
Seconds later she found out.
The ground was rushing up towards them, and she knew that Prowl was excited 
and all, but her spark nearly stopped from fright alone as he suddenly 
bankes up from the ground. Her mind seemingly consumed by the white hot 
light which obviously resembled her fear.
This wasn't fun at all! It wasn't funny either!
She whimpered a little and shook visably, obviously it was clear that she 
had been scared out of her mind.
Battles she could take, beasts she could handle, even pain she had no 
problem with, but heights....
There wasn't anything else in the world she hated more then hights.
Iron Raptor breathed hard and tried to calm her spark, finding it rather 
difficult.
Her eyes became a little wet but the air dried them before she had a chance 
to shed a tear, obviously desturbed.*

< Prowl...slow down.>

* That was the only thought she could get out, the remainder of her mind 
still recovering from the extreme shock she felt moments before.
She hated heights, and Prowl had only made it worse.
How could she ever learn to fly if Prowl scared her witless like this?
But she regained her composure, even though her mind was still reeling. But 
finally she decided that she didn't want her friends to see her shaken up 
like this, her own body still physically shaking.*

< Land a ways from the site.>

____________________________________IRIS

* Iris only watched as Prowl took off, knowing for a fact that Iron Raptor 
wouldn't like it one bit.
Then seeing, in the distance, Prowl take a dive towards the land and then 
continue on his way towards the new ship.*

< Fool! >

* But then she looked towards Firearm as he spoke, narrowing her optics at 
him from under her helm.*

" Knows how to fly, my tin plated ass! All he knows how to do is scare that 
woman slagless!"
